sentences.en: Chatter: To talk rapidly , incessantly, and on trivial subjects; jabber.
sentences.cn: 不停地谈: 急快地 、 不停地谈论琐事; 急促含糊地说.

sentences.en: Don't talk on and on [ jabber away ] when you can say it in a few words.
sentences.cn: 两句话能说完的事就别犯 碎嘴子 了.

sentences.en: I would jabber on like monkey in a tree.
sentences.cn: 我像一只猴子一样在树上一直说.

sentences.en: Jabber all you want in about 30 seconds my associates from paradis falls will join us.
sentences.cn: 随便你怎么说好了,30秒之后,我那些天堂陨落的合伙人就会加入我们的.

sentences.en: Jabber is an open instant message and presence protocol and has been widely used.
sentences.cn: jabber作为 一种流行的开放式即时消息传递和现场服务协议,已经获得了广泛的应用.

sentences.en: Listen to the jabber of those monkeys.
sentences.cn: 听那些猴子在吱吱喳喳地叫.

sentences.en: Monkwords, marybeads jabber on their girdles : roguewords, tough nuggets patter in their pockets.
sentences.cn: 僧侣话, 诵《玫瑰经》的念珠在他们的腰带上嘁嘁喳喳;江湖话, 硬梆梆的金币在他们的兜里当榔当啷.

sentences.en: The tourists were jabbering away on the bus.
sentences.cn: 那些游客在公共汽车上叽叽呱呱地说话。

sentences.en: We are pleased that a group of flying like the Orioles, jabber incessantly between classes.
sentences.cn: 我们高兴得像一群放飞的黄鹂, 课间不停地吱吱喳喳.

sentences.en: When the eagles are silent, the parrots begin to jabber.
sentences.cn: 当老鹰沉默时, 鹦鹉就开始叽叽喳喳了.

trans.tran_cn: 快而含糊地说, 吱吱喳喳地叫, 闲聊
trans.tran_en: to talk quickly in an excited and unclear way – used to show disapproval

trans.tran_cn: 急切而含混不清地说，急促兴奋地说话
